data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Komai, Tomoyuki, Ng, Peter K. L. (2013): A new species of sesarmid crab of the genus Chiromantes (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura) from the Ogasawara Islands, Japan. Zootaxa 3681 (5): 539-551, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3681.5.3
